Name: Argha Noah
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
5 ml Lustau Oloroso Don Nuño Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Delicately spiced, honeyed and sherried aged rum.
History: Created in January 2009 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Argha Noah contains 222 calories
